item.description:
Are you a designer? Did you come into WordPress from WYSIWYG software like Dreamweaver? Don't know where to begin? This month, we'll be approaching WordPress theme development from a designer's perspective.

Our sponsor this month is Skytemple Design.

View a longer description of this & past meetups on our website.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: October WordPress: Theme Development for Designers
